duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle technology-related requests of all severity, complexity, and urgency from clients via helpdesk, email, telephone, and verbal communications.
Resolve or escalate requests in a timely manner to adhere to service level agreements.
Perform technical maintenance tasks according to schedule and checklists.
Assist in creating and improving existing operating procedures and guidelines.
Support all departments in reaching goals set by company leadership.
Maintain customer service and satisfaction by following company policy and procedures.
Project a positive image of the organization to employees, clients, industry, and community.
